mapper.update: MERGE INTO AUTH_KEY t1 USING (SELECT #{email} as email, #{authKey} as code FROM dual) t2 ON (t1.EMAIL = t2.email) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CODE = t2.code, CREATE_TIME = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (AUTH_KEY_NO, EMAIL, CODE, CREATE_TIME) VALUES (SEQ_AUTH_KEY_NO.NEXTVAL, t2.email, t2.code, sysdate)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "AUTH_KEY" (AUTH_KEY_NO, CODE, EMAIL, CREATE_TIME) VALUES (SEQ_AUTH_KEY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{authKey}, #{email}, SYSDATE)
